response.overview: With the ruthless members of a vengeful street gang known as the Killing Hand breathing down his neck, a reluctant criminal (Jason Courtemanche) tries desperately to escape his past and leave his evil ways behind him. But the unbearable temptation to sin threatens to lead him astray. Can a kindly local priest (Patrick Luce) intervene to save the sinner from himself?
response.title: The Killing Hand
